FULL STACK WEB DEVELOPER

About ME

Before learning to code I was going door to door sales pitching PestControl for about three summers making good money but not a super enjoyable job. During the rest of the year I was going to college to begin working on my Bachelors Degree. After switching my major multiple times because I thought all my classes were not motivating me to be better my mom suggested that I learn to code. Long story short I was told about a web dev bootcamp and I have been enjoying code ever since.

I'm always going to keep expanding my knowledge of code.Currently I have experience using JavaScrip, HTML, CSS, and NODE.
